content: AC-D DS Drywall stud cutting disc Longer-lasting abrasive disc for cutting drywall stud and track using chop saws ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Unbeatable blade lifespan – Hilti’s ultimate chop saw disc for cutting drywall studs, engineered to help you get more done with the same disc Higher cutting speed – a premium grain and bond system makes these discs faster, stronger and more durable Documented safety data – comprehensive datasheets to support compliance with abrasives safety standards available Applications Cutting drywall track and studs to size using chop saws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Drywall studs Tool type: Chop saw Disc diameter: 14 in Technical Data | Base material | Drywall studs | Tool type | Chop saw | Blade / disc shape | Flat, Type 1 ### ITEMS- 436732 - Cutting disc 14x3/32x1 DS SPX - Package Size 10 pc
